projects.title: zkintro
projects.description: Italian adaptation of Zero-Knowledge Proofs educational materials covering mathematics, programming guides, and practical examples. Comprehensive resource for learning ZK cryptography.

projects.title: DAO Data Visualization
projects.description: Visual exploration platform for DAO governance key performance indicators with reproducible data pipelines. Tools for analyzing on-chain governance metrics and sustainability.

projects.title: Rust-Chain
projects.description: Blockchain implementation from scratch in Rust, featuring core data structures and consensus mechanisms. Educational project demonstrating blockchain fundamentals.

projects.title: Swapfee Dynamic Gas
projects.description: DApp prototype enabling gas payment via custom tokens on IOTA network with programmable transaction support. Winner of 3rd place at IOTA Hackathon 2024.

projects.title: Commercio.network
projects.description: Source code for Commercio.network, a document-focused blockchain built on Cosmos SDK. Enterprise blockchain solution for document certification and eIDAS compliance.

projects.title: EU-DREAM
projects.description: European project on blockchain-based data marketplaces for energy sector. Research on privacy, trust, and interoperability using IDSA connectors and SSI solutions.

projects.title: DataCellar
projects.description: European research project focusing on decentralized data management and blockchain integration for secure data sharing.

projects.title: Energy Data Marketplace (Ocean Protocol)
projects.description: Research project exploring energy data marketplaces using Ocean Protocol. Published at IEEE COMPSAC 2023. Focus on decentralized data exchange in energy sector.
